title: 44 - 44 "Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!"Transliteration: "Egao no Tabitachi! Saraba Kokyō Kokoyashi Mura" (Japanese:笑顔の旅立ち!さらば故郷ココヤシ村) Kōnosuke Uda Michiru Shimada 513.2 October 11, 2000(2000-10-11)[80] —
transformers_text:
44 - 44 "Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!"Transliteration: "Egao no Tabitachi! Saraba Kokyō Kokoyashi Mura" (Japanese:笑顔の旅立ち!さらば故郷ココヤシ村) Kōnosuke Uda Michiru Shimada 513.2 October 11, 2000(2000-10-11)[80] —

With Arlong's defeat by Luffy, Arlong's reign of terror is over and no one has anything on their mind except to party the fall of Arlong. As the crew celebrates, Nami reflects on her hometown and decides to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates.
